Package com.sqlcom.databases

Class DatabaseMYSQL

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sqlcom.databases.Database
      • com.sqlcom.databases.DatabaseMYSQL
  • public class DatabaseMYSQL
extends Database
    This Database file is for Connecting to Mysql databases.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseMYSQL

        public DatabaseMYSQL​(java.lang.String dbName,
                     java.lang.String dbHost,
                     java.lang.String dbPort,
                     java.lang.String dbUsername,
                     java.lang.String dbPassword,
                     java.lang.String dbUniqueId)
              throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                     java.sql.SQLException
        This initiates a MySQL database object that extends Database class.
        Parameters:
        dbName - The Database name
        dbHost - The database host url
        dbPort - The database url
        dbUsername - The database username
        dbPassword - The database password
        dbUniqueId - The database unique id
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - This will get thrown if the mysql driver is missing.
        java.sql.SQLException - this will get thrown if anything with connecting to the database goes wrong.
